fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`ib PCLMULQDQ xmm1, xmm2/m128, imm8`
`ib VPCLMULQDQ xmm1, xmm2, xmm3/m128, imm8`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a carry-less multiplication of two quadwords, selected from the first source and second source operand according to the value of the immediate byte. Bits 4 and 0 are used to select which 64-bit half of each operand to use according to Table 4-13, other bits of the immediate byte are ignored.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
